title: Commercial Network Engineer II
description: Spearheading advanced network design and service deployment for enterprise clients. Leading strategic initiatives to optimize service activation workflows and elevate customer satisfaction through technical excellence.

title: Commercial Network Engineer I
description: Orchestrated the end-to-end design, deployment, and validation of DIA, EPL, and Cellular Backhaul services. Proactively resolved network constraints to enable multi-gigabit delivery and led a company-wide initiative for Active Ethernet CPE deployment.

title: Service Activation Technician III
description: Directed the activation of mission-critical Ethernet and Cellular Backhaul services while maintaining rigorous performance standards. Developed automation scripts for CPE configuration, significantly accelerating deployment timelines.

title: Service Activation Technician II
description: Led the Activation team and collaborated across departments to streamline Active Ethernet deployments and MACD workflows. Standardized technical documentation for activation protocols to ensure operational consistency.

title: Service Activation Technician I
description: Managed the activation and lifecycle (MACD) of PON, HFC, and SIP services with a focus on reliability. Played a key role in troubleshooting complex service issues to ensure customer success.

title: IT - Helpdesk Technician
description: Provided comprehensive technical support for internal staff, managing end-to-end employee onboarding and hardware/software lifecycles. Efficiently resolved service tickets to maintain enterprise productivity.

title: TAC Support Technician
description: Delivered remote technical support for residential triple-play services, resolving complex connectivity issues while educating users on system functionality.
